stories.original_headline: Intermittent fasting fails to beat standard dieting for weight loss
stories.original_summary: Intermittent fasting has become one of the most talked-about weight loss trends in recent years, promising dramatic results with simple changes to when you eat. But a major Cochrane review suggests the reality may be far less exciting. After analyzing 22 clinical trials involving nearly 2,000 adults
stories.fantasy_headline: New Eating Spell Fails to Outshine Old Ways for Slenderness
stories.fantasy_story: The Alchemists' Guild recently tested a popular new 'Intermittent Eating Charm' for achieving a slender physique. Many hoped this unique enchantment, which changed meal timings, would bring astonishing results. However, after extensive arcane studies involving nearly two thousand folk, it was found to be no more effective than traditional healthy eating habits.

stories.original_headline: The RAM shortage is coming for everything you care about
stories.original_summary: Maybe you've heard: Memory is expensive now. The price of RAM has tripled, quadrupled, even sextupled depending on the type of chip, all because AI companies are gobbling it up. But maybe you've thought: I don't buy memory sticks! I don't build my own PCs! It won't affect me, right? I'm here to tell
stories.fantasy_headline: Enchanted Memory Crystal Prices Soar, Threatening All Magic Wares
stories.fantasy_story: The cost of enchanted memory crystals, vital for scrying mirrors and arcane scrolls, has risen dramatically. Elder Seer Guilds are acquiring vast quantities for their powerful oracle enchantments. This scarcity means prices for many magical artifacts will soon be much higher for everyone across the realms.

stories.original_headline: The biggest app in the whole wide world
stories.original_summary: Last summer, Bria Sullivan was getting ready to launch her app, an adorable companion called Focus Friend meant to help people manage their screen time. Her outlandish dream was to get 100,000 downloads. She'd been building the app with Hank Green, a creator with a huge audience, so she thought mayb
stories.fantasy_headline: New Enchanted Companion Scroll Becomes Kingdom's Most Popular Charm
stories.fantasy_story: Artisan Bria Sullivan crafted a charming new enchantment, the 'Focus Friend' scroll, to help folk manage their gaze upon scrying pools. With the aid of famous bard Hank Green, she hoped for many to acquire it. To her delight, over one hundred thousand citizens across the realms have now embraced this magical companion.
